extendedInfo.description: Introducing: Simply Anagrams!Simply Anagrams is an easy to play and engaging game for mobile devices thatâs hard to put down. Simply Anagrams boasts the following features:* Very high replay value.* Two game modes: Casual Game gives you all the time you need to solve a puzzle, and Two  Minute Game when youâre ready to challenge yourself.* Shuffle: Gives you a new perspective on the current puzzle.* Share on Facebook providing a way for you to boast to your friends when you have a really impressive game.* Visually appealing custom user interface provides a unique experience. Designed to be quick to learn and easy to use, the Simply Anagrams allows you to enter words and navigate word lists quickly on any sized device.* Lively sounds make pressing buttons and finding words a rewarding experience.* The hand-crafted Simply Anagrams dictionary has been evolving for nearly 9 months and contains nearly 10K words. Great efforts have been taken to remove offensive words making the game family friendly.* Review word lists after the game to see which words you missed.

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: It looks great and its super fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I cant stop playing this game! I love it! Worth every cent ive been face deep in words for hours now. Well done!
reviews.author: A Google User
